name: Hollowland
description:
In Hollowland you take control of Azrael, The Angel of Death, who has come to a small village to reap the soul of a notorious alchemist. But you quickly realize that nothing is as you expect it.

Now it is up to you to investigate what has happened in this village and look for the clues that will lead you to the alchemist.

In this piece of interactive fiction you interact with the world through talking with the inhabitants of this cursed village and through using magic to investigate various points of interest.

The game has been developed by @gryzlaw for the 2022 Senscape Cursed Adventurous Jam with the theme "We all go a little mad sometimes".

In-game controls:

Left mouse button Click - move to location

Hold left mouse button pressed - follow cursor

'A' - move camera left

'D' - move camera right

Mouse scroll - camera zoom in/out

'E' - Talk / interact

'F' - Perform magic

'Q' - Quit to main menu
